did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Westport Bridges is a collection of newspaper articles and photographs, manuscripts, and a quit-claim deed contributed by townspeople.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Westport Historical Society.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], , [Box no]., Westport Historical Society

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: The collection focuses on the Kings Highway Bridge, Sasco Creek Bridge, Saugatuck (Bridge Street)Bridge and State Street(Post Road) Bridge.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Newspaper clippings dating from 1869 to the present day make up the greater part of the collection.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Information is arranged in alphabetical order by bridge.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Bridges
Kings Highway Bridge
Sasco Creek Bridge
Saugatuck (Bridge Street) Bridge
State Street (Post Road) Bridge
